DOC.brief_summary: This study design compare range dose SB-681323 prednisolone , know effect rheumatoid arthritis patient . By compare two drug effect blood protein indicate rheumatoid arthritis , hope ascertain information effective dose SB-681323 use future .
DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Of Compound SB-681323 Compared To Prednisolone On A Protein That Is Indicator For Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Must diagnosis RA accord revised 1987 criterion American College Rheumatology . Must 3 swell 3 tender/painful joint screen . Must stable weekly methotrexate ( 2.5mg 25mg ) least eight week prior screen . Exclusion criterion : Must morbidly obese .
